==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Tenebrous Mimiflora

|name_1      = Mimicry
|desc_1      = When entering battle, takes the form of a [[Crackling Axe Mitachurl]]. While in this form, the Tenebrous Mimiflora possesses a Void Ward which grants it immunity to DMG until destroyed. Depending on the form it takes, the Void Ward will have a durability of '''70'''. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, or '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack.<br><br>When durability is depleted, the Tenebrous Mimiflora will return to its true form and become briefly stunned, but will re-transform after some time. However, when generating the Void Ward for the second time, then from the third time onward, its durability will be reduced to '''35''' and '''14''' respectively.

|name_2      = Attrition
|desc_2      = Some of the Mimiflora's attacks inflict stacks of Attrition on hit. The amount of stacks inflicted depends on the attack. For each stack, the affected character will lose [[HP]] equal to '''1% Max HP + 50''' after a short delay.

|name_3      = Abyssal Impalement
|desc_3      = While in its true form, shoots forward a trail of spikes, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_4      = Abyssal Spheres
|desc_4      = While in its true form, shoots 3 homing projectiles, each dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_5      = Swing Combo
|desc_5      = Swings its axe 2 times, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} with each swing. There is a chance to immediately follow with '''Teleport Slash'''.
|caption_5   = Version 1
|file_5_2    = Tenebrous Mimiflora Swing Combo 2
|caption_5_2 = Version 2

|name_6      = Electro Slime Toss
|desc_6      = Digs up an Electro Slime from the ground and throws it at the player, dealing '''62.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_7      = Axe Spin
|desc_7      = Spins the axe wildly, rapidly dealing '''12.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. At the end of this attack, performs a powerful final swing, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_8      = Axe Dance
|desc_8      = Performs a two-move dance with its axe to deal '''50% ATK''' and '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_9      = Axe Slam
|desc_9      = Leaps into the air to slam down at the player's location with their axe, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. 

|name_10      = Teleport Slash
|desc_10      = Teleports to the player and performs a single slash, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and inflicting '''14''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit.
|file_10      = Tenebrous Mimiflora Teleport Slash 2

|name_11      = Teleport Axe Spin
|desc_11      = Teleports to the player, then spins the axe wildly, rapidly dealing '''12.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. At the end of this attack, performs a powerful final swing, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. Every hit of this attack inflicts '''7''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.

|name_12      = Teleport Axe Slam
|desc_12      = Teleports to the player, leaps into the air to slam down at the player's location with their axe, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and inflicting '''14''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit. 
}}
